<Extension()> Public Function TryCreatePushNotification (eventGridEvent As EventGridEvent, ByRef pushNotification As PushNotification) As Boolean
static member TryCreatePushNotification : Azure.Messaging.EventGrid.EventGridEvent * PushNotification -> bool

Docs.param: If this method returns true, the pushNotification object contains details populated from eventGridEvent. If this method returns false, the pushNotification object is null.
Docs.summary: Tries to create the object from the details in object. Return value indicates whether the operation succeeded or failed.
